rules_text:
Lifelink, vigilance
Eclipse Witch's power is equal to the number of different types of mages you control. [i](Druids, Shaman, Warlocks, and Wizards are mages.)[/i]
{4}{W}{B}, Discard a card: You gain life equal to the mana value of the card discarded this way. Each opponent loses that much life.
